mapper.select: select ar.`create_time` as create_time, ar.`request_no` as request_no, cu.`username` as username, p.`name` as product_name, ar.`bill_plan` as bill_plan, ar.`hit` as hit, ar.`fee` as fee, ar.`balance` as balance from `api_req` ar left join `product` p on ar.`product_id` = p.`id` left join `client_user` cu on ar.`user_id` = cu.`id` where ar.`client_id` = #{clientId} and ar.`user_id` = #{userId} and ar.`product_id` = #{productId} and ar.`create_time` >= #{fromDate} and ar.`create_time` < #{toDate}
